SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: EPDS01-Able to Laugh and See Funny Side
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been able to laugh and see the funny side of things.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPDS - Able to Laugh and See Funny Side

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have looked forward with enjoyment to things.
Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have blamed myself unnecessarily when things went wrong.
Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been anxious or worried for no good reason.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPDS - Anxious or Worried No Good Reason

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have felt scared or panicky for no very good reason.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPDS - Scared or Panicky for No Good Reason

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: EPDS01-Things Getting on Top of Me
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - Things have been getting on top of me.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPDS - Things Getting on Top of Me

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been so unhappy that I have had difficulty sleeping.

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: EPDS01-I Have Felt Sad or Miserable
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have felt sad or miserable.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPDS - I Have Felt Sad or Miserable

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: EPDS01-So Unhappy I Have Been Crying
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - I have been so unhappy that I have been crying.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: EPDS - So Unhappy I Have Been Crying

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale - The thought of harming myself has occurred to me.
